myapps.entry: Unofficial app to discover the Deezer database
Officieuze app om de Deezer database te ontdekken

Discover the wide range of music in the Deezer database. You can listen to previews and view the details of the wide collection of Deezer songs. Surfacing modes allows to discover new artists per genre.
Search mode searches for tracks, artists and albums. Advanced searches can also be performed with: 'artist: <name>' 'album: <name>' 'track: <name>' 'label: <name>' 'dur_min: <dur>' 'dur_max: <dur>' 'bpm_min <bpm>' 'bpm_max <bpm>'
The sorting can be set in the settings.
Setting up an account, getting more personalized results and translations will be implemented in the near future.
Feel free to contact me for translations.
!!This app is in no way affiliated with www.deezer.com.!!
